data.text: Wonderful place to stay in Dubai with very good hospitality and wonderful breakfast. Connected with Deira City Centre you will never feel bored with a vibrant shopping area and food court and cinema. I will come back again for sure. Loved the location near DXB.
data.title: Wonderful place to stay in Dubai

data.text:
One of the best I have been

Very good and friendly stuff , specially reception Mrs.Dinushi & Donna are angles there , very kind and understanding .
I will keep a very good memory of being in this hotel.
After this when my flight connection would be from Dubai , I will reserve only this hotel for overstaying.
Also good for vacation to spend
Very good breakfast
data.title: Pullman Bubai Creek is One of the best

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Valued Guest,

Thank you for choosing Pullman Dubai Creek City Centre and for your kind words about your experience with us. We are thrilled to hear that you consider our hotel one of the best you have ever been to.

We are delighted that you found our staff very good and friendly, especially  Dinushi and Donna at the reception. They will be thrilled to hear that they made a positive impact on your stay. We are glad that you plan to reserve only our hotel for overstaying during your flight connections from Dubai and that you found our hotel suitable for vacation stays.

Your feedback about our breakfast is truly appreciated. We strive to provide a memorable experience for all our guests, and we are pleased to hear that we have succeeded in doing so for you.

Thank you once again for your kind words, and we look forward to welcoming you back for another wonderful stay.

Kind Regards,
Laura Nicli
Hotel Manager
owner_response.author: Laura Nicli

data.text:
Everything is excellent 
Thank you! The response is great and keep it up
Thank you for your hospitality good food and environment treatment and adressing our expectations. The class room facility and cleaninesa is also very amaizing. Please keep it up!
data.title: Very nice

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Valued Guest,
Thank you for your kind words and for choosing Pullman Dubai Creek City Centre. We are delighted to hear that you had an excellent experience during your stay with us.

Our team takes great pride in providing exceptional hospitality and ensuring that our guests' expectations are met. We are pleased to hear that you enjoyed our good food and environment. Cleanliness is a top priority for us, and we are glad that you found it to be amazing.

Your feedback motivates us to continue providing excellent service, and we are committed to maintaining the high standards that you have come to expect from us.

Thank you once again for your feedback, and we look forward to welcoming you back for another memorable stay.

Kind Regards,
Laura Nicli
Hotel Manager
owner_response.author: Laura Nicli

data.text:
One of the great stays of Dubai. Staffs are great and a great bit of hospitality enjoyed out there.
Gym facilities and the people out there are an awesome set of people.
The extended time period in case of a late day or the ease of use is excellent.
data.title: Great stay with great hospitality

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Mr. Abhishek,
We are delighted to hear that you had one of your best stays in Dubai with us at Pullman Dubai Creek City Centre. Our team works tirelessly to provide exceptional hospitality, and it's rewarding to know that their efforts were appreciated.

Our gym facilities are designed to cater to our guests' needs, and we're glad to hear that you found them to be excellent. We strive to ensure that our guests have a comfortable and enjoyable stay, and we're pleased to hear that the extended time period and ease of use of our facilities met your expectations.

Thank you for choosing Pullman Dubai Creek City Centre, and we look forward to welcoming you back for another memorable stay in the future!

Warm regards,
Laura Nicli
Hotel Manager
owner_response.author: Laura Nicli

data.text:
I stayed at Pullman Creek, a fantastic hotel with  pleasant rooms, stunning views, and exceptional service. The hotel's modern amenities and friendly staff made my stay truly memorable. 

It's conveniently connected to Deira City Centre, making it perfect for shopping, dining, and entertainment. 

The food is excellent, and Melonika cooks a delicious fried egg.
data.title: A stay at Pullman Creek

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Valued Guest,
Thank you for choosing to stay at Pullman Dubai Creek City Centre and for sharing your wonderful experience with us. We are thrilled to hear that you had a fantastic stay and that our rooms, views, and service exceeded your expectations.

We are glad that you found our hotel conveniently connected to Deira City Centre Mall, and we hope you had a great time shopping, dining, and enjoying the entertainment options nearby.

We will be sure to pass along your compliments to Melonika for her delicious fried egg. Your satisfaction is our priority, and we look forward to welcoming you back for another memorable stay.

Warm regards,
Laura Nicli
Hotel Manager
owner_response.author: Laura Nicli
